Classes

class  g2m
 This class does the high level stuff for creating a model from gcode. It runs the interpreter, and creates a canonLine object for each canonical command generated by the interpreter. It also does error checking and stores the cannonLines. It calls methods on each canonLine object to display it. Eventually it will enable the user to see which gcode line creates which bit of the path, and vice versa. More...
